mapper.insert: insert into dish (category_id, name, price, image, description, status, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) values (#{categoryId}, #{name}, #{price}, #{image}, #{description},#{status}, #{createTime},#{updateTime},#{createUser}, #{updateUser});
mapper.select:
select * from dish
and name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
